responses: Hello! How can I assist you today?
Hi there! How can I help?

examples: I want to create a new room
How do I start a project room?
Set up a room for collaboration
responses: To create a room, navigate to the 'Create Room' section from the dashboard and fill in the project details.
You can create a room by clicking on 'Create Room' on the homepage and inviting team members.

examples: How can I post a discussion?
I want to share my thoughts in the forum
Where can I add a post?
How do I create a post in the room?
Start a discussion in the forum
responses: To post a discussion, go to the 'Discussion Forum' in your room and click 'New Post' to share your thoughts.
Navigate to your project's discussion forum and click 'Add Post' to start a new discussion.

examples: How do I upload project files?
responses: To upload files, click on the 'Files' tab in your project room and select 'Upload Files'.
Go to the 'Files' section of your room and drag-and-drop your documents or use the upload button.

examples: How do I track project progress?
Where can I check task statuses?
responses: To track progress, use the 'Task Management' tab in your room to view tasks, milestones, and deadlines.
The 'Task Management' section in your project room provides a clear overview of ongoing and completed tasks.

examples: How can I chat with my teammates?
Start a group chat in the room
How do I message my group?
responses: You can use the 'Chat' feature in your project room for real-time communication with your teammates.
To chat with your team, open the room and click on the 'Chat' tab for instant messaging.

examples: Will I get updates on project changes?
Can I get reminders for deadlines?
What happens if someone comments on my post?
responses: You will receive notifications for new posts, comments, and updates directly in the notification center.
Project milestones and comments will trigger alerts that you can view in your notifications tab.

examples: How do I download project content?
responses: To export content, go to the 'Export' section in your project room and select 'Export as PDF'.
Click on 'Export PDF' in your room to download the project discussions, files, and milestones.

examples: Where can I find the discussion forum?
Where is the task management tab?
Guide me to the chat section
responses: The discussion forum, chat, and task management tabs are all located within each project room for easy access.
You can find all key sections like Chat, Files, and Discussion Forum directly in your project room menu.
